name: Horror labyrinth
description:
You are in the center of this labyrinth, and you must try to get out of it. The labyrinth is divided into several colored parts of a different color, in order to guide you more easily. 

You can also try this game in Virtual Reality 3D if you download the Android version on Google Play Store.

Good luck to everyone,
Your Zaileek Studio team.

Don't forget to visit our website at zaileek-studio.net16.net.

Tags: virtual reality, vr, labyrinth, labyrinthe, 3D, zombie, horror, cardboard.
Warning! This game features some zombie images.
